proposal: Hey Flywheel community, congrats on reaching 14 holders on the ETH network! 🎉 Your project is like a well-oiled machine, turning volatility and arbitrage into yield. We've got some tools that could help keep your flywheel spinning. Ever thought about deploying your own DEX or maybe a blockchain-based lottery? It's all B2B, so you're not just earning PEAS, you're creating the farm. Let's chat!
